thread.title: Come October 1, and the Odoo 9 is Finally Here
thread.title_full: Come October 1, and the Odoo 9 is Finally Here - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Come October 1, and the Odoo 9 is Finally Here
text:
Odoo is coming up with an updated version of Odoo version 9 in the first week of October 2015. This is the latest iteration of the immensely popular open source suite of applications out there.
San Francisco, CA (PRWEB) October 02, 2015
Odoo is a true blue next generation technology solution that allows businesses to attain unmatched competitive advantage. The application is without the complexities of other enterprise softwares and yet delivers highly optimized performance for businesses across all scales and sizes. is expected to be packed with high performance features. It is expected to enhance the future readiness of enterprise applications with a slew of additional functionalities.
Value Proposition of Odoo 9
The world saw a sneak peek of the prowess of Odoo 9 at its yearly conference Odoo Experience 2015 in Jun 3 at Belgium. Slated for October ’15 1st week release, the enterprise application is sure to wow the world with its performance oriented, enterprise grade functionalities. The entire suite is expected to be bifurcated into two versions – the Enterprise Edition (similar to other enterprise level open source solutions such as SugarCRM and Magento) and the Community Edition.
In line with the massive proliferation of mobile apps, it has also launched an app market place (similar to Android or iOS), where people can buy or sell commercial Odoo based solutions. Odoo’s value proposition is bolstered by 2 million users with availability of 4000 apps and supported by 100 plus community of contributors.
What features does Odoo 9 pack in?
Odoo 9 is packed with some amazing future ready features such as –
Creative Website Builder CMS
 Brand New WYSIWYG Editor Website Versions More Powerful Building Blocks Quick Form Builder Updated Customization Tools Alpha Beta Testing Modes Support for Multiple Websites
Secure and Scalable E-commerce
 Customer Portal Support for Digital Products such as publications, code. Payment Gateway Integrations Paypal, Authorize.net Built in Support for shipping companies such as FedEx, UPS, USPS< DHL Ebay and Amazon Integration
Intuitive User Interface
 Sameter Navigation Menu Fully responsive with support for Mobile Web on Android, IOS Slick looking Dashboard with Charts and Graphs
Accounting, Invoicing and Payments solution that delivers superior RoI
 Improved Reconciliation Smarter Financial Year Closing Simplified Configuration Assets Send invoices to customers by email in one click Integration with 24.000 Banks Support for Single Euro Payments Area (SEPA) Payments Import bank statements in OFX, QIF, CSV, CODA Import Print Checks Batch Deposit
CRM on Steroids
 Lead, Opportunity, Account Management VOIP support with One Click calls Schedule Calls Call center support wtth Calling Queue Mass Email Marketing Tracking ROI on Email Campaigns Analytics Support for Themes Live Chat
Exclusive Retail and Restaurant Point of Sale
 Support for managing a Restaurant Loyalty Management Support for Kitchen and Receipt printer Hardware Support for Touch Screen Monitor, Cash Box, Bar code scanners, Customer Display and credit card reader.
Other Enterprise Level Apps that Deliver Incredible Outcomes to Business
 Human Resources and Payroll Project Management Manufacturing Resource Planning Slides with support for Docs and Videos Subscription Management Contract Management Warehouse Management Inventory Management
About Pragmatic
Pragmatic Techsoft Inc. is the first name in high caliber Odoo Solutions. It has built tremendous capabilities in Odoo based solutions. It has streamlined competencies in people, process, and project management, to build a formidable reputation in Odoo based solutions for diverse industry verticals. This has helped it gain a competitive advantage in just 8 years across multiple versions of Odoo for industries as diverse as E-commerce, Manufacturing, Retail, Hotels, Restaurants, Trading and Distribution, Logistics, Healthcare, University, Rental, Construction and Service Companies spread across 30 nations.
Its experience is in end to end delivery of services and solutions that includes configuration, implementation, customization, support and maintenance of high performance Odoo systems, for companies of all sizes – right from small system of 5 to 10 users, to large systems with 100 plus users. Pragmatic has developed and worked with a number of interesting Odoo system integrations with Magento, Prestashop, Amazon, Ebay, Jira, Xero among others. Pragmatic has also enabled Odoo testing on the Amazon Cloud by launching it from the AWS Marketplace. It has also worked on some of the other enterprise needs including Data Integration and Data Warehousing using Talend and Pentaho, Business Intelligence and Analytics using Pentaho, Cloud Applications built on Amazon Web Services, Mobile development with Android.
